title: Why I Left the Right, What Kind of Socialist Am I? What I Dislike About the Left (25K Q&A)
description:
Thanks for 25K subs :) Here's a Q&A video for ya.
In this video, I discuss how I developed my left-wing political views, why I am a libertarian socialist and not a Leninist, MAGA in Canada, some books about socialism, What I dislike about the Left, and a lot more. 

Twitter: https://x.com/overzealots_
Discord: https://discord.gg/5nwqahxA8A
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/isaaczale

TIMESTAMPS:
0:00 How I Became Left-Wing
5:33 What I Do For a Living
6:10 Is Leninism a Net Positive or Negative?
9:49 What Kind of Socialist I Am
10:07 My Favourite Music Artist/Genre/Album
10:33 Is Nationalism Good or Bad?
11:55 What I Dislike About the Left
12:23 Thoughts on Bernie Sanders
12:53 Is Canada Anti-Socialist? Rise of MAGA Up North
13:53 Opportunistic Parasocial Relationships
14:25 Personal Inspirations
14:44 Recommended Books about Socialism
17:23 Am I an Anarchist?
18:18 Favourite Content Creators
19:15 Favourite Movies/Digital Media
19:52 Thoughts on Marx
20:41 Miscellaneous
